name: World of Gems 2
description:
This game is a GEM!
Magic Fairy needs your help in a new great magic adventure! Match different elements of the same color to complete the level and let little Fairy to move through hundreds of exciting and various levels!
To get incredible results, plan your moves very carefully because they are limited!
World Of Gems 2 is one of the best match 3 games and completely free to play!

Take on this Fairy World alone or play with friends to see who can get the highest score!

High-quality great graphics and a wide variety of themes
Easy and fun to play, but a challenge to fully master
Over 300 marvelous arcade and puzzle levels
Different level types, for the most unforgettable magic trip
Leaderboards for you and your friends
Awesome boosters and power-ups to help you through the game
Easily sync the game between devices and unlock full game features when connected to the Internet
Multi-device support
Free regular app updates!

World of Gems does NOT contain any ads!

SUPPORT
Сontact us in game Settings > Support or email us support@playcus.com

Thanks for playing World Of Gems!
